typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		empName as string,
		age as integer,
		Deptid as string,
		salary as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empdata
empdata window(over(Deptid),
	desc(salary, true),
	rownum = rowNumber()) ~> Window1
Window1 sink(input(
		empid as string,
		empName as string,
		age as string,
		Deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['windowSalary.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
